title: Can a teacher view your attempt in an unsubmitted assignment? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on where you write the assignment. If it’s on paper, the teacher cannot see it until you hand it to him/her. If it’s on a Google doc, the teacher can only see it if you share it with him/her. If it’s on Google classroom, the teacher can see it. In my case, my settings are such that if the student hasn’t “turned in” the assignment, I am not notified that it’s even there. I could open the student’s page and look—then I would see it—but I wait till the due date and time to open it, whether “turned in” or not. So, yes, it depends on how the teacher has chosen the settings. If you’re talking about another platform, I cannot help you.
